entry.title: Monday: Showers. High plus 4.

entry.title: Monday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers and flurries changing to a few flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 2:10 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023
